text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Modi Sir, please look ahead of lockdown. This lockdown is not taking us further. How long do we need to be under lockdown. There has to be another way of looking ahead. Please bear that the Covid-19 is not going to end soon enough, before that lockdown will wear us out.
